_xResult.title: Maria Jersey Dress
_xResult.shortdesc: Bespoke couture dress, sleeveless with roll collar
_xResult.longdesc:
Working with top London tailor & couturier Lino Piani is not like any experience you've had before. For one thing, he's an expert in dressing the female body with creations that flatter and fit. Second, he approaches every commission with creative consultation to help you get precisely the outcome you want. If you have envied the highly personalized experiences that men get when they buy a top quality custom suit, you'll be delighted to know you can have this same experience no matter where you live. Lastly, his attention to detail and the finest fabrics mean this is an investment you'll treasure for years to come.

 

Straight from the runway, this go-anywhere sophisticated dress is sixties inspired but ultimately timeless for any generation. You'll be able to hand this dress down to your daughter, if she hasn't already stolen it from you. Bespoke luxury quality couture, sleeveless jersey dress with drop shoulders. Bias rolled collar designed to flatter your silhouette with top stitch on collar, vertical front seams and flap pocket with self covered buttons. All handcrafted in Britain on a slight trapeze line in 100% wool. Plus, it's fully lined.

 

  • Available in many colors - see color card, give your choice in checkout notes
  • Zip fastening at center back with covered button at back neck
  • Decorative pocket detail
  • 100% premium multi-season Italian wool jersey. Lining 96% acetate / 4% elastane
  • Dry clean only

 

New Customer Special! 15% off your Lino Piani order for all new customers!
